title: Cars of the future - expectations
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 7 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups I mostly agree, and I totally agree. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Portion of respondants.

In Race Maximal safety, I totally agree had the highest Portion of respondants 753.0 among the 2 groups and in Driving enjoyment -Driving should be fun, I mostly agree had the lowest Portion of respondants 35.0.
In Race Maximal safety, I totally agree had the maximum Portion of respondants and it saw the lowest in Race Driving enjoyment -Driving should be fun out of all 7 Races.
Race Maximal safety and Driving enjoyment -Driving should be fun had the biggest gap of 713.0 between the highest and lowest Portion of respondants found for I totally agree.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 7 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups I mostly agree, and I totally agree. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Portion of respondants.

Race Maximal safety had the maximum Portion of respondants among all 2 groups, and it was for I totally agree. The minimum Portion of respondants was observed in Race Driving enjoyment -Driving should be fun for I mostly agree.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 7 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups I mostly agree, and I totally agree. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Portion of respondants.

In Race Maximal safety, I totally agree had the highest Portion of respondants 753.0 among the 2 groups and in Driving enjoyment -Driving should be fun, I mostly agree had the lowest Portion of respondants 35.0.
In Race Maximal safety, I totally agree had the maximum Portion of respondants and it saw the lowest in Race Driving enjoyment -Driving should be fun out of all 7 Races.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 7 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups I mostly agree, and I totally agree. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Portion of respondants.

Out of all 2 groups, I totally agree had the highest Portion of respondants in Race Maximal safety and I mostly agree had the lowest Portion of respondants in Race Driving enjoyment -Driving should be fun.
Among all the Races, I totally agree had the highest Portion of respondants in Race Maximal safety and lowest Portion of respondants in Race Driving enjoyment -Driving should be fun.
There is a gap of 713.0 between the highest and lowest Portion of respondants found for I totally agree in Race Maximal safety and Driving enjoyment -Driving should be fun.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Portion of respondants was found in case of I mostly agree.

Averaging all 2 groups I mostly agree, and I totally agree, the Race Maximal safety is the maximum Portion of respondants and Reflecting my socialstatus/my self-image is the minimum Portion of respondants.
